definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: band, fillet (= charm or amulet acc. to Ephr. Syr., fulakth/ria acc. to o( (Ebrai=ov of Hexapl., cf. RS:JPh xiii, 286; in NH [[כסת]] usu. = cushion, bolster, pillow), only pl. [[מְתַפְּרוֹת כְּסָתוֹת עַל־]] Ez Eze 13:18 women sewing bands upon elbows; c. sf. 2 fpl. [[כִּסְתוֹתֵיכֶ֫נׇה]] v:Eze 13:20.
